GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v6.0.8
GSD.description:
IB/hfi1: Correctly move list in sc_disable()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.8 by commit b8bcff99b07cc175a6ee12a52db51cdd2229586c, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 13bac861952a78664907a0f927d3e874e9a59034. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: IB/hfi1: Correctly move list in sc_disable()
